name: Just One More (lopez824)
description:
Prototype for a game jam with the theme of Spicy. 

If a spicy dish tastes delicious I just can't stop eating it even if it is killing me, so that ended up being the inspiration for my mechanic. 

How could I translate Just One More Bite into gameplay?

The approached I wanted to take was a game with a single input to encourage the player to "act once more" since it is easy to do. The mechanic itself became stacking cubes.

The goal of the game is to strive for a high score by always stacking one more cube!
